'''The Tome of Taliesin''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Tell a Tale for Taliesin]]" and obtain [[Taliesin's Manuscript]].
